docs.snippet: European advices two days later are received by the Melita, which was boarded off Cape Race yesterday afternoon by the news-yacht of the Associated Press. She left Liverpool on Wednesday, the 5th inst. The intelligence is highly important.
docs.lead_paragraph: European advices two days later are received by the Melita, which was boarded off Cape Race yesterday afternoon by the news-yacht of the Associated Press. She left Liverpool on Wednesday, the 5th inst. The intelligence is highly important.
